pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 10, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 10, 2017:

Houston, United States of America

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with business representatives.

Marriott Marquis Houston
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of Texas, the Honorable Greg Abbott.

Marriott Marquis Houston
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the United States Senator for Alaska, the Honorable Lisa Ann Murkowski.

Marriott Marquis Houston
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

River Oaks Room “B”, 4th Floor
Hampton Inn Houston Downtown
Houston, Texas
United States of America

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart Houston for Ottawa, Canada.


Note: all times local
